meanings.definition: A person who watches or identifies birds as a hobby.
meanings.sent1: Birders enjoy spotting different types of birds in nature.
meanings.sent2: Many birders carry binoculars and bird guides when they go birdwatching.
meanings.sent3: The group of birders chuckled as they tried to identify a rare bird.
meanings.sent4: She had the keen eyesight of a birder, spotting a tiny bird hidden in the bushes.
meanings.sent5: The birder's passion for birds was evident in the way they patiently waited to catch a glimpse of a colorful bird.

meanings.definition: The act of observing or identifying birds.
meanings.sent1: Birders often gather in parks to enjoy the activity of birdwatching together.
meanings.sent2: The birders were excited to participate in the annual bird count event.
meanings.sent3: During the birders' meeting, they shared stories of their birdwatching adventures.
meanings.sent4: The peaceful morning was interrupted by the loud chatter of the birders as they spotted a rare bird.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of birding lies in the quiet moments when birders connect with nature through observation.
